channel.title: Search for mental health
channel.description:
A series of talks about the latest advances in psychiatry by staff members of Forest Hospital near Chicago.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Family help
item.description: This program features an interview with Dr. David Rubinstein about family treatment.
item.dc:creator: Squire, Morris B.
item.dc:subject: Psychiatry.
